M

main(String[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.gui
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.MiniAESDemo
 
MiniAES - Class in miniaesdemo
This class implements all of the necessary steps to encrypt and decrypt strings with the Mini AES algorithm.
MiniAES() - Constructor for class miniaesdemo.MiniAES
The constructor is empty, this class doesn't contain any variables outside of its methods.
miniaesdemo - package miniaesdemo
 
MiniAESDemo - Class in miniaesdemo
Class used to test the Mini-AES
MiniAESDemo() - Constructor for class miniaesdemo.MiniAESDemo
 
mixColumns(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.MiniAES
This method multiplies each element by an element of a constant array, the result of this multiplication is retrieved from Tables.MULTIPLICATION_TABLE.
mixColumnsAES(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.MiniAES
This method multiplies each element of the plaintext by a Rijndael constant matrix.
MUL11 - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the Multiplication results when input is multiplied by 11.
MUL13 - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the Multiplication results when input is multiplied by 13.
MUL14 - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the Multiplication results when input is multiplied by 14.
MUL2 - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the Multiplication results when input is multiplied by 2.
MUL3 - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the Multiplication results when input is multiplied by 3.
MUL9 - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the Multiplication results when input is multiplied by 9.
MULTIPLICATION_TABLE - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the MiniAES mixColumns multiplication substitution table.
